nodes.text: Escape was the name for a pair of Lambda-class T-4a shuttles which were used by the Rebel Alliance. The shuttles were stationed on the Frigate Huntress carrying officers. The Huntress participated in the Second Battle of the Pakuuni system. When the frigate's shields were down the two shuttles launched out of the hangar and were consequently shot down by Imperial Ace Maarek Stele.
The shuttles appear in Battle three mission three. They are to be destroyed as part of a bonus objective, which can only be achieved by draining the shields of the Huntress.
